name: Heroku-Aria2c
description: A Telegram Torrent (and youtube-dl) Leecher Bot uploading to GDrive

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable webhooks when in env mode

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: This should be the same as 'App name' above

RCLONE_CONFIG.description:
rclone config to mount in one line, replace line breaks with '
'

RCLONE_DESTINATION.description: Path to store your file in Rclone drive. Must start with a forward slash
